original: Hoffstedt, Nils Axel Magnus, andre läkare, Vänersborg, f. 4/11/09’ i Linköp. av apot. Axel Emanuel H. o. Sofia Lindahl. G. 36 m. Ingegärd Sonja Sylvia Linder. Barn: Erik f. 39, Christina 42, Birgitta 44. — Stud:ex. i Lund 28, med. kand. i Upps. 32 o. med. lic. där 38. Assist :läk. v. Ulleråkers ’Sjukh. 38, e. o. andre läk. där 39, andre läk. v. Källshagens sjukh. i Vänersborg sed. 47.
translated: Hoffstedt, Nils Axel Magnus, second physician, Vänersborg, born November 4th, 1909 in Linköping, to pharmacist Axel Emanuel H. and Sofia Lindahl. Married in 1936 to Ingegärd Sonja Sylvia Linder, with whom he had three children: Erik (born 1939), Christina (born 1942), and Birgitta (born 1944). He graduated from Lund with a diploma in 1928, later received a Bachelor of Medicine from Uppsala in 1932 and a Medical License in 1938 from the same institution. He worked as an assistant physician at Ulleråkers Hospital in 1938, and later became a second physician at Källshagens Hospital in Vänersborg in 1947.
